articles.title: New mother, 29, dies from coronavirus in hospital without being able to cuddle her son - Daily Mail
articles.description: Fozia Hanif, 29, passed away in Birmingham Heartlands Hospital from coronavirus after her ventilator was turned off on April 8. She gave birth to her son via caesarean section on April 2.
articles.content:
A new mother died from coronavirus in hospital without being able to cuddle her son who she had given birth to just days before. 
Fozia Hanif, 29, passed away in Birmingham Heartlands Hospital after her ventilator was turned off on April 8.

articles.content:
